title: Lamamra in Beirut to partake in Consultative Meeting of Arab Foreign Ministers
text: Minister of Foreign Affairs and National Community Abroad Ramtane Lamamra arrived Friday in Beirut (Lebanon) to take part in the Consultative Meeting of the Arab Foreign Ministers.

Lamamra was welcomed, upon his arrival at Beirut’s international airport “Rafik Hariri” by his Lebanese counterpart Abdallah Bou Habib, who chairs the current session of the Arab League’s ministerial Council.
The Algerian and Lebanese Foreign ministers discussed the bilateral cooperation and the main issues that could be raised during the ministerial meeting, scheduled for Saturday.
The meeting is part of the periodic meetings of coordination and dialogue between the Arab ministers of foreign affairs on issues related to the joint Arab action.
